import React from 'react' import { CollapseIcon, CheckIcon, InProgressIcon } from '../../asset/icons/box/index.js'; import { Buttons } from '../../components'; import Progress from './Progress'; import './boxes.css' const Boxes = ({ order, estimatedTime, total, items, currentStep, buttonStatus }) => { return (

Order: #{order}

Estimate Time: {estimatedTime} mins

Total: {total}

Food item(s): {items}

Order Received
content
) } export default Boxes;
